enabled.description: Whether the Runtime Secret Scan is enabled. If true and a new schedule is not configured, the previously configured schedule is applied. If no schedule has been configured, an error is returned.

skipIfRuleNotChanged.description: Whether scheduled Runtime Secret Scans will be skipped. If true, scheduled Runtime Secret Scans of the container image are skipped when the rule has not changed.

cron.description: The cron expression for the scheduled scan based on UTC. Only daily and weekly schedules are currently supported.
